main_definition: Sox is an informal term referring to a shoe or footwear, specifically boxer-style athletic shoes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Boxing gloves used in the sport of boxing
meanings_and_examples.example: The fighters were wearing their socks and heavy-duty protective sox during the match.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression for something or someone that is not very impressive, often used in a humorous or dismissive way
meanings_and_examples.example: His magic tricks were no real sox; I've seen better at the circus.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term referring to shoes (specifically boxer-style athletic shoes)
meanings_and_examples.example: He bought a new pair of sox for his daily jogging routine.
